    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy level diagram when sodium reacts with chlorine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energiestufe Diagramm, wenn Natrium mit Chlor 
reagiert</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diagramme de force quand le sodium réagit avec du
chlore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diagrama do nível de energia quando o sodium 
reagir com o cloro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schema del livello di energia quando il sodio 
reagisce con cloro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάγραμμα ενεργειακών επιπέδων όταν αντιδρά το 
νάτριο με το χλώριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diagrama del nivel de energía cuando el sodio 
reacciona con clorina</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These diagrams demonstrate the changes in the number of electrons in the energy levels of sodium and chlorine when they react forming ions.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Atoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reactions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chlorine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Electrons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">elements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy levels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ionic substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sodium</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Diagramme zeigen die Änderungen in der 
Zahl Elektronen in den Energiestufen des Natriums und des Chlors, wenn
sie reagieren, Ionen bildend.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces diagrammes démontrent les changements du 
nombre d'électrons dans les forces du sodium et du chlore quand ils 
réagissent formant des ions.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes diagramas demonstram as mudanças no 
número dos elétrons nos níveis de energia do sodium e do cloro 
quando reagem dando forma a íons.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi schemi dimostrano i cambiamenti nel numero
di elettroni nei livelli di energia di sodio e di cloro quando 
reagiscono formando gli ioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα διαγράμματα καταδεικνύουν τις αλλαγές στον 
αριθμό ηλεκτρονίων στα ενεργειακά επίπεδα νατρίου και χλωρίου 
όταν αντιδρούν διαμορφώνοντας τα ιόντα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos diagramas demuestran los cambios en el 
número de electrones en los niveles de energía del sodio y de la 
clorina cuando reaccionan formando los iones.</string>
          </description>
